Student.title: Student
Student.description: Represents a student in the school attendance tracker.

grade.description: The grade the student is in (e.g., '9º Ano').

class.description: The class the student is in (e.g., 'A').

ensino.description: The education level the student is in (e.g., 'Fundamental', 'Médio').

AttendanceRecord.title: AttendanceRecord
AttendanceRecord.description: Represents a single attendance record for a student on a specific date.

studentId.description: The ID of the student this record belongs to.

studentName.description: The name of the student for easier querying.

date.description: The date of the attendance record in YYYY-MM-DD format.

status.description: Indicates whether the student was present or absent.

ensino.description: The education level of the student.

/students/{studentId}.description: Stores individual student data. The document ID is automatically generated by Firestore.

/attendance/{attendanceId}.description: Stores individual attendance records. The document ID is automatically generated by Firestore.
